reviews.review_msg: Unclear, disorgnanized, avoid like the plague.

Awful professor. I was really looking forward to this class because students from previous years who were not taught by this professor told me how great it was. I was extremely disappointed. It's ridiculously unorganized, no clear learning objectives. No clear way to study for exams. This professor is a nice enough guy but cannot teach at all.

Horrible Prof, Doesn't teach you anything and expects you to have a background in everything (chem, bio, stats, calc) he doesn't spell very well and his assignments are riddled with mistakes. Focus on the textbook for studying because he spells major chemicals wrong and applies the same spelling in all his notes and slides.
